imdb.title: Kanon
imdb.plot: As a young child, Aizawa Yuuichi had often visited his cousin in the city; however, something drastic happened to keep him away for seven long years. Now, Yuuichi returns, his memories of those days are simply gone.

episodes.title: Hakugin no jokyoku 'overture'
episodes.plot: In a town blanketed by snow, a place from his distant childhood, Yuichi reconnects with his cousin Nayuki. As she gives him a tour of his new home, he struggles with memories long faded.

episodes.title: Yuki no naka no iri sai 'introit'
episodes.plot: After his first day at school, Yuichi is able to stir the memories of Ayu, who happily recalls a promise he made to her years before. But the strange girl who later attacks Yuichi doesn't seem happy at all.

episodes.title: Kioku no nai kumikyoku 'partita'
episodes.plot: Yuichi's attacker claims to have amnesia, and with the gaps in his own recollections and Ayu's forgetfulness, Yuichi starts to think the town might somehow alter people's memories.

episodes.title: Nazo darake no ureshi 'divertimento'
episodes.plot: Makoto has an appointment to interview for a job at a café. Meanwhile, another encounter with Shiori makes Yuichi late for his movie date with Ayu.

episodes.title: Iede to shineko no tonsou kyoku 'fuga'
episodes.plot: Makoto's carelessness with a kitten causes Yuichi to lash out. Unfortunately, Makoto's response to his anger is to run away. Later, Mai somehow directs him to her likely location.

episodes.title: Ko kitsune no komori ka 'berceuse'
episodes.plot: Makoto is growing weaker, leading Yuichi to increase the amount of attention he gives her. Her condition grave, Yuichi recalls Mishio's words - and he also remembers a fuller picture of Makoto's past.

episodes.title: Hikari to kage no kansou kyoku 'intermezzo'
episodes.plot: Yuichi discovers Mai's bad reputation; she has a history of being blamed any time something bad happens on campus. Hoping to help her fix her image, Yuichi invites her to the school dance.

episodes.title: Igyou no enbukyoku 'waltz'
episodes.plot: Yuichi's plan to salvage Mai's reputation seems to be working! With him in a tux and her looking radiant in her dress, nothing could ruin the school dance - except maybe the sudden appearance of a demon.

episodes.title: Abuna ge na san juusou 'trio'
episodes.plot: Yuichi's eager to defend Mai after her outburst at the dance, but someone beats him to it. His chance to play the hero dashed, Yuichi turns his attention to convincing Mai he's brave enough to fight alongside her.

episodes.title: Hibiware ta kyousoukyoku 'concerto'
episodes.plot: Yuichi is throttled by Mai's revelation that the demons might come after him next. Sayuri is worried about both of her friends, but an attempt to surprise Mai on her birthday could end disastrously!

episodes.title: Kakurenbo no shou soumeikyoku 'sonatina'
episodes.plot: After fighting their way to the last demon, Mai mysteriously disappears and Yuichi is floored by an invisible force that conjures up visions of the past - and reveals a shocking secret!

episodes.title: Mayonaka no seitankyoku 'oratorio'
episodes.plot: Yuichi decides it's time to make good on his promise to Shiori. The two friends enjoy a day of snowball fights and whack-a-mole, but Yuichi's evening is marred by tragic revelations.

episodes.title: Ane to imouto no mugon ka 'Lieder ohne Worte'
episodes.plot: Yuichi desperately wants to make Shiori's birthday special, but he can't seem to think of how - until a chat with Ayu provides just the right inspiration.

episodes.title: Kiesari yuku kanjo gakushou 'adagio'
episodes.plot: Hoping to make her final days special, Yuichi hatches a plan to surprise Shiori with a birthday party on the day before her birthday! But there's one thing he must do first - convince Kaori to attend the party.

episodes.title: Fureai no renshuu kyoku 'étude'
episodes.plot: Yuichi sees Nayuki in a different light when the final track meet rolls around. Later on, Ayu and Yuichi's search for the all-important missing item leads to something very special.

episodes.title: Wakare no yasoukyoku 'nocturn'
episodes.plot: Still basking in the glow of their kiss, Yuichi and Ayu spend more and more time together. Everything appears to be going splendidly - until their burgeoning romance is derailed by a visit to Ayu's school.

episodes.title: Kimi no i nai rinbu kyoku 'ronde'
episodes.plot: Ayu's disappearance prompts Yuichi to search even more diligently for her missing item. Nayuki goes out of her way to cheer up her heartsick housemate, but she my regret requesting strawberry cake.

episodes.title: Tsuisô no Kôkyôgaku 'symphony'
episodes.plot: Grief-stricken Nayuki locks herself in her room and refuses to let anyone enter. Tragic memories concerning Ayu wash over Yuichi, causing him to wander into the woods during a snowstorm.

episodes.title: Yume no hate no kanon 'kanon'
episodes.plot: Yuichi is still searching for Ayu. Akiko may hold the key to discovering her whereabouts, but will Yuichi be able to handle the truth about her current condition?
